author: wn.com
title: Democratic Debate Was A Continuation of ‘Plantation Politics,’ Says Sheriff David Clarke [Video]
text: The Democrat presidential candidates were pandering to the Black Lives Matter movement by engaging in “plantation politics” and “whoring for votes” during Tuesday night’s debate on CNN, according to Milwaukee County Sheriff David Clarke. The Democratic debate featured five candidates: former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton, Vermont independent socialist Bernie Sanders running as a Democrat,...
